feed.title: File Browser Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.38.0
entry.content:
Username in Sidebar

You can now find your username in the sidebar. This new navigation option goes to the user settings, which means that the old settings menu item will only be shown to administrators.

Docker Image Updates

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

Changelog

  • 14b0dfec3477c57ffe89bc15675448a157e9ffe4 chore(release): 2.38.0
  • 528ce92fad6dcc8e8b7910036bf9175146e27bf7 feat: Show the current users name in the sidebar (#2821)
  • fbe169b84f28cba22ea87f01b52f2420f1ea6814 fix: prevent page change if there are outstanding edits (#5260)
  • b4eddf45e4d7e6f6ccf242e67fe20f89f5e2f9a9 feat: Updates for project File Browser

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.39.0
entry.content:
Docker Image Updates

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

Changelog

  • e6ffb653740e37118d1882edb8d71ebe6663fece chore(release): 2.39.0
  • 5c5942d99514b433e09d90624bbe58992eab6be2 build: lightweight busybox-based container build (#5285)
  • 1a5c83bcfe847f1e41a44cef23fd795b19b6b434 build: remove upx
  • 5a8e7171b1b41eff771fe27133c91d2c250896a8 fix: Settings button in the sidebar
  • 0f27c91eca581482ce4f82f6429f5dac12f8b64e fix: drop modify permission for uploading new file (#5270)
  • 7c716862c1bd3cdedd3c02d3a37207293db197ca feat: rewrite the archiver and added support for zstd and brotli (#5283)
  • 01c814cf98f81f2bcd622aea75e5b1efe3484940 feat: Improve Docker entrypoint and config handling
  • 35ca24adb886721fc9d5e1a68cfc577e2c5f0230 build: improve docker image and binary sizes
